content.rendered:
The support tickets are slowing down so we know we’re getting close to a stable release!

Piklist v09.9.5 is ready for download and testing. To make it easy for you, you can just download from piklist.com/trunk, which will redirect you to the trunk version on WordPress.org.

Just a reminder, if you’re in NYC tomorrow please stop by WordCampNYC, where we’ll be showing off some great features in v0.9.9.x.
